00033 INLINE void cami(int c, int n, int a, int f, unsigned short *d)
00034 {
00035    *d = (unsigned short)
00036        *((unsigned long *) (0xC00000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2)) & 0xFFFFFF;
00037 }
00038 
00039 INLINE void cam16i(int c, int n, int a, int f, unsigned short *d)
00040 {
00041    *d = (unsigned short)
00042        *((unsigned long *) (0xC00000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2)) & 0xFFFFFF;
00043 }

00046 INLINE void cam24i(int c, int n, int a, int f, unsigned long *d)
00047 {
00048    *d = *((unsigned long *) (0xC00000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2)) & 0xFFFFFF;
00049 }

00051 INLINE void cam16i_q(int c, int n, int a, int f, unsigned short *d, int *x, int *q);
00052 {
00053    unsigned long tmp;
00054 
00055    tmp = *((unsigned long *) (0xC00000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2));
00056    *x = (tmp & 0x40000000) != 0;
00057    *q = (tmp & 0x80000000) != 0;
00058    *d = (unsigned short) tmp;
00059 }
00060 
00061 INLINE void cam24i_q(int c, int n, int a, int f, unsigned long *d, int *x, int *q);
00062 {
00063    unsigned long tmp;
00064 
00065    tmp = *((unsigned long *) (0xC00000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2));
00066    *x = (tmp & 0x40000000) != 0;
00067    *q = (tmp & 0x80000000) != 0;
00068    *d = tmp & 0xFFFFFF;
00069 }
00070 
00071 INLINE void cam16i_r(int c, int n, int a, int f, unsigned short *d, int r);
00072 {
00073    unsigned long tmp;
00074    unsigned short q;
00075 
00076    do {
00077       tmp = *((unsigned long *) (0xC00000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2));
00078       *q = (tmp & 0x80000000) != 0;
00079       *(d++) = (unsigned short) tmp;
00080    } while (q);
00081 }
00082 
00083 INLINE void cam24i_r(int c, int n, int a, int f, unsigned long *d, int r);
00084 {
00085    unsigned long tmp;
00086    unsigned short q;
00087 
00088    do {
00089       tmp = *((unsigned long *) (0xC00000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2));
00090       *q = (tmp & 0x80000000) != 0;
00091       if (!q)
00092          break;
00093 
00094       *(d++) = tmp & 0xFFFFFF;
00095    } while (1);
00096 }
00097 
00098 INLINE void cam16i_sa(int c, int n, int a, int f, unsigned short *d, int r);
00099 {
00100    unsigned long tmp;
00101    unsigned short q;
00102 
00103    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00104       tmp = *((unsigned long *) (0xC00000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2));
00105       *q = (tmp & 0x80000000) != 0;
00106       if (!q)
00107          break;
00108 
00109       *(d++) = (unsigned short) tmp;
00110       a++;
00111    }
00112 }

00164 INLINE void camo(int c, int n, int a, int f, unsigned short d)
00165 {
00166    *((unsigned long *) (0xC90000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2)) = (d);
00167 }

00179 INLINE void cam16o_q(int c, int n, int a, int f, unsigned short d, int *x, int *q)
00180 {
00181    unsigned long status;
00182 
00183    *((unsigned long *) (0xC00000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2)) = (d);
00184    status = *((unsigned long *) (0xC00780));
00185    *x = (status & 0x40000000) != 0;
00186    *q = (status & 0x80000000) != 0;
00187 }
00188 
00189 INLINE void cam24o_q(int c, int n, int a, int f, unsigned long d, int *x, int *q)
00190 {
00191    unsigned long status;
00192    *((unsigned long *) (0xC00000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2)) = (d);
00193    status = *((unsigned long *) (0xC00780));
00194    *x = (status & 0x40000000) != 0;
00195    *q = (status & 0x80000000) != 0;
00196 }

00200 INLINE void camc(int c, int n, int a, int f)
00201 {
00202    *((unsigned long *) (0xC90000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2))
00203        = 0;
00204 }
00205 
00206 
00207 INLINE void camc_sa(int c, int n, int a, int f, int r)
00208 {
00209    int i;
00210    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00211       *((unsigned long *) (0xC90000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2)) = 0;
00212       a++;
00213    }
00214 }
00215 
00216 INLINE void camc_sn(int c, int n, int a, int f, int r)
00217 {
00218    int i;
00219    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00220       *((unsigned long *) (0xC90000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2)) = 0;
00221       n++;
00222    }
00223 }
00224 
00225 INLINE void camq(int c, int n, int a, int f, int *q)
00226 {
00227    unsigned long tmp;
00228    tmp = *((unsigned long *) (0xC00000 | ((((f << 5) | n) << 4) | a) << 2));
00229    *q = (tmp & 0x80000000) != 0;
00230 }

00260 /*---- LAM functions -----------------------------------------------*/
00261 
00262 /* addresses of the CIO data/ctrl ports                                   */
00263 #define CIO1_BASE_ADRS          ((char *)0x00e00100)
00264 #define CIO1_DATA_C_ADRS        ((char *)(CIO1_BASE_ADRS + 0x00))
00265 #define CIO1_DATA_B_ADRS        ((char *)(CIO1_BASE_ADRS + 0x04))
00266 #define CIO1_DATA_A_ADRS        ((char *)(CIO1_BASE_ADRS + 0x08))
00267 #define CIO1_CNTRL_ADRS         ((char *)(CIO1_BASE_ADRS + 0x0c))
00268 #define CIO2_BASE_ADRS          ((char *)0x00e00200)
00269 #define CIO2_DATA_C_ADRS        ((char *)(CIO2_BASE_ADRS + 0x00))
00270 #define CIO2_DATA_B_ADRS        ((char *)(CIO2_BASE_ADRS + 0x04))
00271 #define CIO2_DATA_A_ADRS        ((char *)(CIO2_BASE_ADRS + 0x08))
00272 #define CIO2_CNTRL_ADRS         ((char *)(CIO2_BASE_ADRS + 0x0c))
00273 #define CIO3_BASE_ADRS          ((char *)0x00e00300)
00274 #define CIO3_DATA_C_ADRS        ((char *)(CIO3_BASE_ADRS + 0x00))
00275 #define CIO3_DATA_B_ADRS        ((char *)(CIO3_BASE_ADRS + 0x04))
00276 #define CIO3_DATA_A_ADRS        ((char *)(CIO3_BASE_ADRS + 0x08))
00277 #define CIO3_CNTRL_ADRS         ((char *)(CIO3_BASE_ADRS + 0x0c))
00278 
00279 /* interupt base vectors used                                             */
00280 #define CIO1_IVA                0xD0
00281 #define CIO1_IVB                0xE0
00282 #define CIO2_IVA                0xF0
00283 
00284 #define wait __asm__("nop; nop;")       /* wait two NOPs between CIO accesses */
00285 
00286 
00287 INLINE void cam_lam_enable(int c, int n)
00288 {
00289    char lam_mask;
00290    char *cioCtrl;
00291    int i;
00292    /* enable CIO-interrupt */
00293    cioCtrl = ((n <= 16) ? CIO1_CNTRL_ADRS : CIO2_CNTRL_ADRS);
00294    lam_mask = *cio_ADRS;
00295    wait;
00296    *cio_ADRS = (n <= 8 || n > 16) ? ZCIO_PAPM : ZCIO_PBPM;
00297    wait;
00298    lam_mask = *cio_ADRS;
00299    if (l) {
00300       actLM |= lam->lm;
00301    } else {
00302       actLM &= ~lam->lm;
00303    };
00304    i = intLock();
00305    /* Locking out IRQs necesarry at this point. Otherwise setting the    */
00306    /* CIOs pattern mask bit correponding to the LAM will generate one    */
00307    /* extra interrupt                                                    */
00308    wait;
00309    *lam->cc = lam->pm;
00310    wait;
00311    *lam->cc = actLM;
00312    wait;
00313    *lam->cc = lam->cs;
00314    wait;
00315    *lam->cc = ZCIO_CS_CLIPIUS;
00316    wait;
00317    intUnlock(i);
00318    /* enable the modules LAM */
00319    camc(c, n, 0, 26);
00320 }
00321 
00322 INLINE void cam_lam_disable(int c, int n)
00323 {
00324    char actLM;
00325    int i;
00326    if (lam->cc != NULL) {       /* enable/disable CIO-interrupt   */
00327       actLM = *lam->cc;
00328       wait;
00329       *lam->cc = lam->pm;
00330       wait;
00331       actLM = *lam->cc;
00332       if (l) {
00333          actLM |= lam->lm;
00334       } else {
00335          actLM &= ~lam->lm;
00336       };
00337       i = intLock();
00338       /* Locking out IRQs necesarry at this point. Otherwise setting the    */
00339       /* CIOs pattern mask bit correponding to the LAM will generate one    */
00340       /* extra interrupt                                                    */
00341       wait;
00342       *lam->cc = lam->pm;
00343       wait;
00344       *lam->cc = actLM;
00345       wait;
00346       *lam->cc = lam->cs;
00347       wait;
00348       *lam->cc = ZCIO_CS_CLIPIUS;
00349       wait;
00350       intUnlock(i);
00351    }
00352    /* enable/disable the modules LAM */
00353    if (l)
00354       return ((((*(int *) (lam->ext | (26 << VCCshiftF))) & VCCmaskX)
00355                != 0) ? 0 : -1);
00356    return ((((*(int *) (lam->ext | (24 << VCCshiftF))) & VCCmaskX)
00357             != 0) ? 0 : -1);
00358 }

00361 INLINE void cam_lam_read(int c, int *lam)
00362 {
00363    *lam = *((unsigned long *) (0xC00780));
00364 }
